record.description: College students participate in numerous plays put on by the office of dramatic production under the direction of Davis Edwards. In preparation for Drama Week on the campus this spring, students are presenting "Hedda Gabler" and "Green Grow the Lilacs," [known as] "Oklahoma!" to the world. Left to right: Cynthia Sibley, Karen O’Brien, and Jean Cooke.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: PR stamp. Caption attached. Public Relations stamp.
